name: RSS IBGE
description: Notícias do feed RSS do IBGE (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from typing import Dict, Any
from langchain.tools import BaseTool
from axiestudio.base.langchain_utilities.model import LCToolComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Tool
from axiestudio.inputs import IntInput, MessageTextInput
import feedparser
import logging

logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO)
logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)

class IBGERSSComponent(LCToolComponent):  # Altere o nome da classe para ser consistente
    display_name = "IBGE RSS Feed"
    description = "Notícias do feed RSS do IBGE"
    name = "IBGEFeed"
    inputs = [
        MessageTextInput(
            name="ibge_feed_address",  # Corrija o nome do input
            display_name="IBGE Feed Address",
            required=True,
        ),
        IntInput(name="num_results", display_name="Número de resultados", value=5, required=True),
    ]

    def __init__(self, **data):
        super().__init__(**data)
        self.ibge_feed_address = self.ibge_feed_address or "https://agenciadenoticias.ibge.gov.br/agencia-rss"  # Corrija a referência ao input

    def extract_entries(self, entries, num_results):
        results = []
        for entry in entries:
            entry_data = self.extract_entry_data(entry)
            results.append(entry_data)
            if len(results) >= num_results:
                break
        return results[:num_results]

    def extract_entry_data(self, entry):
        return {
            "title": entry.get("title", "No title"),
            "link": entry.get("link", "No link"),
            "published": entry.get("published", entry.get("updated", "No date")),
            "summary": entry.get("summary", "No summary")
        }

    def build_tool(self) -> Tool:
        class IBGERSSTool(BaseTool):  # Corrigir nome da classe interna
            name = "IBGE RSS Feed"
            description = "Obtém notícias do feed RSS do IBGE."
            ibge_feed_address: str
            num_results: int

            def _run(self, **kwargs: Dict[str, Any]) -> str:
                try:
                    feed = feedparser.parse(self.ibge_feed_address)  # Corrigir para ibge_feed_address
                    component = IBGERSSComponent()  # Instanciar a classe correta
                    results = component.extract_entries(feed.entries, self.num_results)
                    
                    formatted_results = ""
                    for i, result in enumerate(results, 1):
                        formatted_results += f"{i}. Título: {result['title']}\n"
                        formatted_results += f"   Link: {result['link']}\n"
                        formatted_results += f"   Publicado: {result['published']}\n"
                        formatted_results += f"   Resumo: {result['summary']}\n\n"
                    
                    return formatted_results if formatted_results else "Nenhuma notícia encontrada no feed RSS."
                except Exception as e:
                    logger.error(f"Error in _run: {str(e)}")
                    return f"Failed to fetch or process RSS feed: {str(e)}"

        return IBGERSSTool(ibge_feed_address=self.ibge_feed_address, num_results=self.num_results)  # Certifique-se de passar os atributos corretos
code.name: code
